139 
144 class RBTorsionForce::RBTorsionInfo {
145 public:
146  int particle1, particle2, particle3, particle4;
147  double c[6];
148  RBTorsionInfo() {
149  particle1 = particle2 = particle3 = particle4 = -1;
150  c[0] = c[1] = c[2] = c[3] = c[4] = c[5] = 0.0;
151  }
152  RBTorsionInfo(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, int particle4, double c0, double c1, double c2, double c3, double c4, double c5) :
153  particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), particle3(particle3), particle4(particle4) {
154  c[0] = c0;
155  c[1] = c1;
156  c[2] = c2;
157  c[3] = c3;
158  c[4] = c4;
159  c[5] = c5;
160  }
161 };
